title: Butterflies
occurrences: He followed the butterflies until he died.
When the butterflies come, he wants to be buried.
What does "buried when butterflies come" mean?
- He was waiting for us. - What does "When the butterflies come" mean?
He was waiting for the butterflies. We will also see the blind shepherd. It's crazy.
What does "when the butterflies come" mean?
It means when the butterflies come.
He wrote in the will. "Bury me when butterflies come," he says. What does this mean?
So every year, this time tons of butterflies come to this village. Die.
-  When do these butterflies come? Valla is in his ear.
He would follow the butterflies and wait for them to die.
It was the story of a man waiting for butterflies.
Gathering dead butterflies and buried them under his skin.
"When the butterflies come, bury me." he wrote.
Did he want to be buried when the butterflies came?
